input.sentences: the sand was warm and lovely and clean .
the mountains looked amazing from a distance .
even more so with the ocean in front .
output.sentences: High noon on the beach is one of my fave places to be when on vacation.
The warm weather and white sands light a fire in my soul as summer in the midwest is all the warmth I grew up in.
The mountains are so much more breathtaking in person but on the other side, "Little Blue" awaits...
"Little Blue" is a private, tiny cove that no one else seemed to know about so we became regulars.
Yes, we took advantage of the calm beach on our vacation this year.
